Message:
Witches are reviled,
cast as a sinister
presence in the world.
She was no exception.

The Church was after her,
so she fled after saving me.

My parents tried so hard
to keep me quiet though.
Something about how
being saved by a witch
was embarrassing.

But, I knew the truth...
Witches are heroes!

They choose to live
in the shadows,
striking down evildoers
the law can’t punish.
Evil that silences greater evil.

That’s the truth,
that’s what no one gets!
I’m the only one in
this town who understands...

and if this isn’t destiny,
then what is?!

That encounter
meant something.
Meeting her like that...
there’s no question about it!
